personalLearningJourney: Your personal learning journey starts here.
selectPreferredLanguage: Select your preferred language for the app.
tellUsWhoYouAre: Please tell us who you are.
parentSetupDetails: Just a few more details to set up your account.
whatToDoToday: What would you like to do today?
studyZoneDesc: Access textbooks, quizzes, and focus tools.
healthHubDesc: Wellness tools for body and mind.
lockdownDesc: Minimize distractions by entering a full-screen focus session.
ncertDesc: Access the official National Council of Educational Research and Training (NCERT) website for textbooks and materials.
noQuizzesDesc: Get started by creating a new quiz.
errorQuizGeneration: Failed to generate quiz. The AI might be busy, or the topic is too complex. Please try again.
quizNotFoundDesc: The quiz you are looking for does not exist.
setupBuddyDesc: Let's get your new learning companion set up.
automatorDesc: Automate tasks like summarization, data extraction, and analysis on content from any website. Just paste the content and tell the AI what to do.
taskExample: e.g., Summarize this article in 3 bullet points
contentPlaceholder: Paste content from a website here...
rankClimb: Keep completing challenges and activities to climb higher!
leaderboardDesc: See how you stack up! This is a fun, AI-generated leaderboard to motivate you.
noActiveGoals: You have no active goals. Your parent can set some for you in the Parent Zone!
noCompletedGoals: No completed goals yet. Keep working!
healthDashboardDesc: Your central place for wellness tools.
calorieLookupDesc: Enter a dish name, upload a photo, or both for an estimated calorie count.
calorieEstimateNote: Note: This is an AI-generated estimate and may not be 100% accurate. For precise nutritional information, consult a certified source.
wellnessCheckInDesc: This is a private space to reflect on your feelings. Your answers are not stored. This is not a diagnostic tool.
parentDashboardDesc: Manage your child's safety and communication.
emergencyContactDesc: Set up an emergency contact person.
acquiringSatellite: Acquiring satellite lock... Please grant location permission if prompted.
noMessages: No messages yet. Start the conversation!
emergencyContactSetup: Set a person to notify in an emergency.
emergencyActionDesc: This will send a simulated notification to your saved contact.
collaborativeGoalSettingDesc: Set learning and wellness goals for your child.
noActiveGoalsParent: No active goals. Add one from the presets above!
challengeScore: You scored <1>{score} out of {total}</1>. Great job!
comeBackTomorrow: Come back tomorrow for a new challenge.
howCanIHelp: Hello! How can I help you control the app?
micErrorDenied: Microphone access was denied. To use voice commands, please allow microphone permission for this site in your browser's settings.
micErrorGeneric: An error occurred: {error}. Please try again.
confirmLogout: Are you sure you want to log out?
tutorialWelcomeDesc: Ready for a quick tour? I'll show you the main features to get you started on your personalized learning journey.
tutorialThreeZonesDesc: The app has three main sections: the Study Zone for learning, the Health Hub for wellness, and the Parent Zone for safety and collaboration.
tutorialPowerUpStudiesDesc: In the Study Zone, you can create quizzes on any topic with AI, tackle a Daily Challenge, and chat with your AI Study Buddy for help with tricky subjects.
tutorialFocusWellnessDesc: The Health Hub is packed with tools! Look up calories in food, practice mindful breathing, or talk things out with our supportive wellness check-in.
tutorialSafetyTeamworkDesc: Parents can securely log in to view real-time location, send messages, set goals with you, and configure an emergency contact.
tutorialClimbRanksDesc: Everything you do earns you points! Complete goals and quizzes to improve your rank from Novice to Grandmaster and see how you stack up on the daily leaderboards.
tutorialAIAssistantDesc: See the floating brain icon? Tap it to control the app with your voice. Try saying, 'Navigate to my quizzes' or 'Start a 10-minute focus session'.
tutorialYouInControlDesc: Click your avatar in the top-right to personalize your profile or restart this tutorial. You're all set to begin your adventure on PeakPath!
rankUpMessage: You've reached the {rank} rank! Amazing work.
bioPlaceholder: Tell us a bit about yourself...
statusPlaceholder: e.g., Feeling focused, taking a break...
